mapper.insert: insert into board (member, start_date, end_date, title, content, region, file_path, festival_category, place, time, url, fee, age_limit, host_org, inquire, way_to_come) values (#{member}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{title}, #{content}, #{region}, #{file_path}, #{festival_category}, #{place}, #{time}, #{url}, #{fee}, #{age_limit}, #{host_org}, #{inquire}, #{way_to_come})
mapper.select: select * from board where end_date >= sysdate and approve = 1 and end_date - start_date < 10 order by start_date, end_date fetch first 5 rows only

select rownum as rank, idx, start_date, end_date, title, favorites, grade, region, file_path, festival_category from board where end_date >= sysdate and approve = 1 order by favorites desc fetch first 10 rows only
mapper.update:
merge into temp_board t using ( select #{member} as member, #{title} as title, #{start_date} as start_date, #{end_date} as end_date, #{content} as content, #{region} as region, #{festival_category} as festival_category, #{place} as place, #{time} as time, #{url} as url, #{fee} as fee, #{age_limit} as age_limit, #{host_org} as host_org, #{inquire} as inquire, #{way_to_come} as way_to_come
from dual ) s on (t.member = s.member and t.title = s.title) when matched then update set t.start_date = s.start_date, t.end_date = s.end_date, t.content = s.content, t.region = s.region, t.festival_category = s.festival_category, t.place = s.place, t.time = s.time, t.url = s.url, t.fee = s.age_limit, t.host_org = s.inquire, t.way_to_come = s. way_to_come when not matched then insert (member, title, start_date, end_date, content, region, festival_category, place, time, url, host_org, way_to_come) values (s.member, s.title, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.content, s.region, s.festival_category, s.place, s.time, s.url, s.host_org, s.way_to_come)
